header.name: chaos/preprocessor/facilities/empty.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that expands to nothing.

macro.para: This macro is useful in contexts where it is necessary to express emptiness programmatically.

In C99, macro arguments are allowed to be empty. However, this is not the case in C and C++. This macro, combined with , can be used to simulate empty arguments.
#define MACRO(cv) cv()
MACRO((const)) // const MACRO() //
